name: Stone Sabbath
description:
Your sisters dance to defy god, tricked by two wily bards. You attempt to snap them but try as you might, they remain in their blissful trance, oblivious to your efforts.

A solution may be out there in the plains; the Moon Goddess Kerid watches over you, and with her astral powers, the coming of midnight can be pushed back.

But you may very well only be delaying the inevitable.

Play as Loor, pick up your moonlit Scythe, fight your way through hordes of creatures from Cornish mythology, and try to save the merry maidens from their curse.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • E - To Interact
  • Left Click - Standard Attack
  • Right Click - Heavy Attack
  • Escape - Exit to menu
